solution_line_template: Before dinner, she had {end_of_day_amount}+{dinner_drink}=<<{end_of_day_amount}+{dinner_drink}={before_dinner_amount}>>{before_dinner_amount} ounces of CM.

Before drinking {lunch_drink} ounces of CM during lunch, she had {before_dinner_amount}+{lunch_drink}=<<{before_dinner_amount}+{lunch_drink}={before_lunch_drink_amount}>>{before_lunch_drink_amount} ounces of CM.
Before buying {lunch_buy} ounces of CM, she had {before_lunch_drink_amount}-{lunch_buy}=<<{before_lunch_drink_amount}-{lunch_buy}={before_lunch_buy_amount}>>{before_lunch_buy_amount} ounces of CM.
And before breakfast, she had {before_lunch_buy_amount}+{breakfast_drink}=<<{before_lunch_buy_amount}+{breakfast_drink}={initial_amount}>>{initial_amount} ounces of chocolate milk.
